Name: FLYING SHOT
About the game: It is not recommended to play for people suffering from epilepsy! FLYING SHOT is a voxel first-person shooter that involves dismembering opponents, physical blood, realistic destruction of glass and walls, and slow-motion parkour GLASS DESTRUCTIBLE TEST
